WorkItem.Description:
Hello.

im using phpexcel for more than year, but now when i changed lighttpd to apache, it's doesnt work.

error :

10:30:34 Create new PHPExcel object

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'PHPExcel_Writer_Exception' with message 'Could not close zip file /home/admin/mehrpay.com/excel.xlsx.' in /home/admin/mehrpay.com/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php:348 Stack trace: #0 /home/admin/mehrpay.com/excel.php(191): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->save('/home/admin/meh...') #1 {main} thrown in /home/admin/mehrpay.com/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php on line 348


how can i fix that?
i have changed all permissions/ownership of files.

for some reasons i cannot go back to lighttpd
